<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===------ CFIFixup.cpp - Insert CFI remember/restore instructions -------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass inserts the necessary  instructions to adjust for the inconsistency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the call-frame information caused by final machine basic block layout.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pass relies in constraints LLVM imposes on the placement of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// save/restore points (cf. ShrinkWrap) and has certain preconditions about</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// placement of CFI instructions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; For any two CFI instructions of the function prologue one dominates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   and is post-dominated by the other.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; The function possibly contains multiple epilogue blocks, where each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   epilogue block is complete and self-contained, i.e. CSR restore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   instructions (and the corresponding CFI instructions)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   are not split across two or more blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#42; CFI instructions are not contained in any loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Thus, during execution, at the beginning and at the end of each basic block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// following the prologue, the function can be in one of two states:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - &quot;has a call frame&quot;, if the function has executed the prologue, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    has not executed any epilogue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - &quot;does not have a call frame&quot;, if the function has not executed the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    prologue, or has executed an epilogue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which can be computed by a single RPO traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The location of the prologue is determined by finding the first block in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reverse traversal which contains CFI instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In order to accommodate backends which do not generate unwind info in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// epilogues we compute an additional property &quot;strong no call frame on entry&quot;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is set for the entry point of the function and for every block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reachable from the entry along a path that does not execute the prologue. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this property holds, it takes precedence over the &quot;has a call frame&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// property.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// From the point of view of the unwind tables, the &quot;has/does not have call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frame&quot; state at beginning of each block is determined by the state at the end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the previous block, in layout order. Where these states differ, we insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compensating CFI instructions, which come in two flavours:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - CFI instructions, which reset the unwind table state to the initial one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     This is done by a target specific hook and is expected to be trivial</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     to implement, for example it could be:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .cfi&#95;def&#95;cfa &lt;sp&gt;, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .cfi&#95;same&#95;value &lt;rN&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .cfi&#95;same&#95;value &lt;rN-1&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     where &lt;rN&gt; are the callee-saved registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   - CFI instructions, which reset the unwind table state to the one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     created by the function prologue. These are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .cfi&#95;restore&#95;state</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .cfi&#95;remember&#95;state</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     In this case we also insert a &#96;.cfi&#95;remember&#95;state&#96; after the last CFI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     instruction in the function prologue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Known limitations:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; the pass cannot handle an epilogue preceding the prologue in the basic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    block layout</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#42; the pass does not handle functions where SP is used as a frame pointer and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    SP adjustments up and down are done in different basic blocks (TODO)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/cfifixup-h">llvm/CodeGen/CFIFixup.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/densemap-h">llvm/ADT/DenseMap.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/postorderiterator-h">llvm/ADT/PostOrderIterator.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">llvm/ADT/STLExtras.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/iterator-range-h">llvm/ADT/iterator&#95;range.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinebasicblock-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineBasicBlock.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinefunction-h">llvm/CodeGen/MachineFunction.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/passes-h">llvm/CodeGen/Passes.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/targetframelowering-h">llvm/CodeGen/TargetFrameLowering.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set to true if the current block contains the prologue or the epilogue,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// respectively.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasPrologue = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> == PrologueBlock;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Info.HasFrameOnEntry || HasPrologue)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">      HasEpilogue = <a href="#ace087bbcf22f95d79a7a0371116db8b1">containsEpilogue</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the function has a call frame at the entry of the current block or the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current block contains the prologue, then the function has a call frame</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// at the exit of the block, unless the block contains the epilogue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Info.HasFrameOnExit = (Info.HasFrameOnEntry || HasPrologue) &amp;&amp; !HasEpilogue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the successors&#39; state on entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;successors()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SuccInfo.HasFrameOnEntry = Info.HasFrameOnExit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the blocks of the function in &quot;physical&quot; order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Every block inherits the frame state (as recorded in the unwind tables)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the previous block. If the intended frame state is different, insert</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compensating CFI instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Change = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;InsertPt&#91;sectionID&#93;&#96; always points to the point in a preceding block where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we have to insert a &#96;.cfi&#95;remember&#95;state&#96;, in the case that the current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block needs a &#96;.cfi&#95;restore&#95;state&#96;.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++CurrBB;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Pred : CurrBB-&gt;predecessors()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!PredInfo.Reachable ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the block is the first block in its section, then it doesn&#39;t have a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frame on entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    HasFrame &amp;= !CurrBB-&gt;isBeginSection();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Info.StrongNoFrameOnEntry &amp;&amp; Info.HasFrameOnEntry &amp;&amp; !HasFrame) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reset to the &quot;after prologue&quot; state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/insertionpoint">InsertionPoint</a> &amp;InsertPt = InsertionPts&#91;CurrBB-&gt;getSectionID()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InsertPt.<a href="/docs/api/structs/insertionpoint/#ae00c4faa2b6e5f75e2577c7c4988094a">MBB</a> == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CurBB is the first block in its section, so there is no &quot;after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prologue&quot; state. Clone the CFI instructions from the prologue block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to create it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        InsertPt = <a href="#a6766bb9d415c3d929afaa24877e14fc6">cloneCfiPrologue</a>(&#123;PrologueBlock, PrologueEnd&#125;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    &#123;&amp;&#42;CurrBB, CurrBB-&gt;begin()&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There&#39;s an earlier block known to have a stack frame. Insert a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;.cfi&#95;remember&#95;state&#96; instruction into that block and a</span></CodeLine>
